Name: RFID Disable
Condition: Reader Card ID < 500 or Reader Card ID > 700

Name: Door Open
Actions: Set Main door Lock to Unlock

Name: Door Close
Condition: Reader Status is Invalid or Reader Status is Waiting
Actions: Set Main door Lock to Lock

Name: Window Open
Condition: Street Lamp Light >= 10 and Rain MCU Rain Possibility < 0.0
Actions: Set Smart Window On to true

Name: Window Close
Condition: Street Lamp Light <- 9 or Rain MCU Rain Possibility > 0.0
Actions: Set Smart Window On to false

Name: Garage Open Smoke
Actions: Set Smart Garage On to true

Name: Garage Close Smoke
Actions: Set Smart Garage On to false

Name: Coffee On
Condition: Motion For Fan On is true
Actions: Set Coffee Maker On to true

Name: Motion Fan
Condition: Motion For Fan On is true
Actions: Set Smart Fan Status to High
